treasure.info: A powerful magical fan, capable of generating strong winds to extinguish flames or blow away obstacles,
treasure.name: PalmLeafFan

treasure.info:
An armor made of a strong material that reminds of you of... bones? 
When you put it on, the armor rattles and clacks with your every move.
treasure.name: BoneArmor

treasure.info: A mystical artifact capable of trapping living beings by manipulating the dual energies of yin and yang. It can absorb and confine its victims.
treasure.name: YinYangVase

treasure.info: A mystical weapon wielded renowned for its sharpness and lethality, capable of slicing through enemies with ease
treasure.name: TrinitySword
